Lim Wei Siang, Financial Consultant at Advisors Alliance Group - Aia FaLevel 2. RookieAnswered on 08 Mar 2019Investment comes in different forms. There is no best investment but consider these few factors:Why are you investing?What is your risk appetite?How long are you willing to invest/stay invested?How much are you comfortable investing?Self managed vs 3rd party managed?What are the charges to investment products?DO NOT follow blindly. Actions leads to reactions/consequences. Knowledge gives birth to choices. Only when you are aware of the different choices, different consequences can you then make a decision where the consequences are something bearable.0 comments2
